tasks.description:
Your task board is ready! Create tasks here and I'll execute them when you move them to 'In Progress'.

**How to use:**
1. Click '+' to add a new task
2. Fill in title, description, subtasks
3. Drag to 'In Progress' when ready for me to work on it
4. I'll update progress and move to 'Review' when done
